New features: HD (BIP44) Wallets encryption with slight wallet password UI changes
Separated watching-only and signing wallets with child process signer starting from the same terminal binary
Pass-thru versioning of all BlockSettle components
All wizards were replaced by regular styled dialogs
Updated simple and advaced "Create transaction" dialogs
advanced create transaction dialog could be called by holding shift from main window
More clear new primary wallet process if it doesn't exist
Bug fixes: Kill local headless signing process from previous unclean shutdown
